## Description

A clear description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case

Describe the CAM/manufacturing workflow this would support. For example:
- "After optimizing feeds and speeds, I want to regenerate toolpaths without leaving the AI conversation"
- "I need to compare tool libraries across documents"

## Proposed Solution

If you have ideas on how this could work, describe them here. For new tools, what parameters would it take and what would it return?

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've thought about.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, Fusion 360 API references, or examples here.
